instruction: Create a poem about innovation and technology
output:
Innovation and technology,
Broadening horizons and horizons beyond.
Connecting distant places and many faces,
Showing us a world we can fondly bond.

Where it may lead us none can foresee,
Commitment and passion in a perfect mix,
The wonder of technology sets us free,
Where boundaries are forever out of fix. 

Robots and gadgets advance ever so,
Bringing excitement and bringing so much more,
The wonders of the world never to slow,
With innovation at the very core. 

The world so advanced in unknown ways,
Making it better than the yesterday,
Innovation and technology blazingly blaze,
Bringing solutions to light and clear the way.
